page.title: 12A LOCAL ORCHARD
page.content: The plums in the orchard start growing in August.There are 21 different types of plums trees.There are 20 acres of plum trees.The apples start to being eaten in September.There are 20 acres of apples and 18 different types. Ladies pick the fruit because it is easier to get ladies rather than men. The shop opens at 9.30to 12.30 and 1.30 to 5.00.The shop is open 7 days a week. In total there is about 7000 trees in the orchard.They sell about half a ton of fruit every day. If the plums are bunched together then the fruit does not have enough room to grow its proper size so they have to pick some so they are spread out The orchad is 60 years old.The workers there enjoy there work alot.
